roleset.name: to discuss again

example.name: transitive
example.text: The two men spent an hour at Exit 10 , [*]rehashing the event , `` [*] fulfilling the lifelong dream of a young boy now turned [*] 50 , '' Mr. Engelken says [*T*-2] .

roleset.note: REHASH-V NOTES: Frames file for 'rehash' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from rehash.01-v predicate notes)
